title: The REAL Truth About Why You Support (or Oppose) Gay Marriage - Episode 153
description: What is the REAL reason why you either support or oppose gay marriage?  We may give logical reasons for our opinions, but the roots behind your opinion lies - where else? - in your past.  So let's dive into your mind as we always do here in the Psych Files and learn how our attitudes develop over time and how strong attitudes especially come to be held.
